masjid_not_found.en: I couldn't find a masjid named '{name}'. Could you check the spelling or try a different masjid?
masjid_not_found.ur: Mujhe '{name}' naam ki koi masjid nahi mili. Kya aap spelling check kar sakte hain ya doosri masjid try karein?

area_unknown.en: I don't have any masjids listed for '{area}' area. Would you like to see all available areas?
area_unknown.ur: '{area}' area mein koi masjid listed nahi hai. Kya aap sab areas dekhna chahenge?

task_not_found.en: I couldn't find that task. Would you like to see your current tasks?
task_not_found.ur: Mujhe woh task nahi mila. Kya aap apne current tasks dekhna chahenge?

invalid_datetime.en: I couldn't understand the time '{input}'. Could you specify a date or time like 'tomorrow at 5 PM' or 'Jan 15 at 2:30 PM'?
invalid_datetime.ur: Mujhe time samajh nahi aaya '{input}'. Kya aap 'kal 5 PM' ya 'Jan 15, 2:30 PM' jaise specify kar sakte hain?

invalid_recurrence.en: I didn't understand the recurrence pattern '{input}'. Please use patterns like 'daily', 'every Friday', or 'monthly'.
invalid_recurrence.ur: Mujhe recurrence pattern samajh nahi aaya '{input}'. 'Daily', 'har Friday', ya 'monthly' jaise patterns use karein.

backend_error.en: I encountered an error while processing your request. Please try again in a moment.
backend_error.ur: Aapki request process karte waqt error aaya. Thodi der mein dobara try karein.

ambiguous_task.en: You have {count} matching tasks. Which one would you like? I'll list them below:
ambiguous_task.ur: Aapke paas {count} matching tasks hain. Kon sa chahiye? Main neeche list kar raha hoon:
